articles.description: Apple's third-generation AirPods may have a lot in common with the AirPods Pro.
articles.content:
Angela Lang/CNET
Apple may be ready to release a new pair of AirPods in March. New leaks suggest the third-generation of Apple's regular AirPods will share some features with the $249 AirPods Pro, l… [+3310 chars]
